sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.youtube-configurator
  .container
    v-text-field(:label="label"
      :placeholder="placeholder"
      @keyup.enter="onSubmit"
      clearable
      hide-details="auto").input-style
      svg-icon
    v-switch(v-model="switchValue"
      label="Pause on load"
      color="red"
      :class="{activated: switchValue}").switch-style
</template>

<script>
import { VTextField } from 'vuetify/components'
import { VSwitch } from 'vuetify/components/VSwitch'
import SvgIcon from '../assets/svg/shark-icon'
export default {
  components: {
    VTextField,
    VSwitch,
    SvgIcon
  },
  data() {
    return {
      switchValue: false,
      path: mdilMessageImage
    }
  },
  emits: ['onSubmit', 'toggle-switch'],
  props: {
    placeholder: {
      type: String,
      default: ''
    },
    label: {
      type: String,
      default: ''
    }
  },
  watch: {
    switchValue() {
      this.$emit('toggle-switch', this.switchValue)
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onSubmit(event) {
      const userInput = event.srcElement._value
      if (userInput && userInput.replace(/\s/g, '').length) {
        this.$emit('onSubmit', userInput)
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style>

</style>
<style lang="scss" scoped>
@import 'src/styles/flex';

.youtube-configurator {
  @include flex-row();
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin: 25px;

  .container {
    @include flex-column();
    justify-content: space-between;

    .input-style {
      color: red;
      // background-color: black;
      width: 350px;
    }

    .activated {
      color: red;
    }
  }

}
</style>
